page.title: 15ILKESTON SWIMMING BATHS
page.content: {Ilkeston Swimming Baths}is open to the public and many clubs. It is also open to schools on week days. There are three pools, a{diving pool,}a{learner {pool}and a{main pool.}The is a {cafeteria}upstairs where you can buy refreshments. Here is one girl's view of the club. {Ilkeston Swimming Club}is where children or even adults learn to{swim, {dive,play water polo}and many other {water sports.}It is great fun because when you can swim the coaches pick you for{galas}and you travel all over the country. If you cannot swim you start in the teaching pool where you learn to swim a width and gradually progress to the main pool. We train 5 nights a week. On Sunday night there is a special training session for the A team but it is very hard work. However I enjoy it so much I don't complain.
